body: I've been wondering how the servers get stuck in 1 map, and how exactly did the hubs go down are they stuck?? is it a coding problem or is it down from the host, someone please explain ^_^
body_tagged: I've been wondering how the servers get stuck in 1 map, and how exactly did the hubs go down are they stuck?? is it a coding problem or is it down from the host, someone please explain ^_^
title: How exactly did the hubs go down??

replies.body: I think it's confidential information Avicus won't give out. Sorry, but that's just how it is.
replies.body_tagged: I think it's confidential information Avicus won't give out. Sorry, but that's just how it is.

replies.body: I actually don't know, could be a server or plugin issue, but no one is 100% sure.
replies.body_tagged: I actually don't know, could be a server or plugin issue, but no one is 100% sure.

replies.body: Yes, I think you are all correct. I think we should all just check out for a while and let our super super busy developer work all this out. I think we should check back next Saturday and be super thankful and patient that we get to play sometimes. We expect way way to much..

replies.body:
The servers stopping at 1 map could be cause of a YML error. Think that the server that eventually crashes is Nebula05 and always on Camp Erbosi.
The Hubs can crash either because of a DDoS or (i think) the few holograms. Anyways, both cases seems hard to happend.
